name: Garden Witch
description:
GardenWitch is a sidescroller about growing strange and mystical plants, all in an attempt to get your village's 'soul stone' back home where it belongs.

Gameplay
Scavenge for resources, plants, and raw materials to craft into supplies and weapons, all while exploring a huge, uneven cave.

Mechanics

  • Fishing
  • Crafting
  • Magic
  • Reincarnation
